text: Emirates puts customers first with flexible COVID-19 waiver policies. Keep your tickets for 760 days, get travel vouchers valid for 2 years or get full refunds. We’re with you every step of the way. https://t.co/RpYsomYizI https://t.co/oWGWJXJJAW
